attributes.action: Give an option to school and university students to complete their course online
attributes.additional_details: This will slow the spread of covid cases as well, but only for people who actually would prefer online schooling. Covid cases have shot up ever since schools and universities are open. It seems that the government is very eager to keep the schools open, and this seems like a compromise that will be effective and pleasing for everyone.
attributes.background: Although there is a national lockdown and universities and schools remain open, I and numerous others believe that there should be an available option for students to complete their course online if for example there are vulnerable people at their home, or they are more at risk

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition calling on the Government to require schools to support home learning:

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065

Universities are independent institutions so deciding how to deliver university courses is a matter for individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons. The Government could require university campuses to close as part of current Covid-19 restrictions. If you would like this to happen you might like to sign the following petition:

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
